DOC.brief_summary: Most patient undergo coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) require long saphenous vein ( LSV ) harvest leg . This report associated significant morbidity ( leg swelling , pain , infection , bruising , wound discharge ) 50 % patient . Endoscopic vein harvest ( EVH ) report associated reduction complication implement within investigator ' service 2012 . Although initial report concern regard graft patency LSV harvest EVH , NICE European Cardiology Society ( ESC/EACTS ) guideline 2014 support use EVH technology . Last year service evaluation investigator ' department show significant cost benefit EVH compare open vein harvest ( OVH ) match group ( 50 EVH 50 OVH patient ) . The purpose study evaluate group assess incidence MACCE ( Major adverse cardiac cerebrovascular event ) patient 's quality life ( QOL ) least 1 year surgery . MACCE assess contact patient 's GP and/or Cardiologist QOL questionnaire ( SF12v2 ) send patient along patient information sheet . It estimate data collection would complete within 3 month start .
DOC.brief_title: MACCE After Endoscopic Vein Harvest CABG
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient underwent CABG ( isolate combine ) period Jan 2012 Dec 2013 2 . LSV harvest EVH ( Study group ) 3 . LSV Harvested OVH match EVH group ( Control group ) 1 . Patient deceased time study start
